entries.s_fae10b21:
I've been working my whole life, and have very little to show for it.  

More and more of the money I make is being used to line the pockets of the rich.  There is little I can do by myself, which is why I am asking you for help.
entries.s_f485390d: Good show, all this spice is going to fetch a pretty penny.  See you around.
entries.s_eaa416f0: There is a fairly large group of thugs here in town.  One of them is holding onto a crucial data disk, on which the location of a huge stock of stolen supplies is stored.
entries.s_e8f293a0:
I knew I could see the spirit in your eyes.

You can find these thugs hanging around and causing trouble.  

Keep in mind talking with them is an exhausted option.  I wouldn't approach any of them without a blaster at my hip.
entries.s_ddb27082: Not yet, but I'm working on it.
entries.s_dbc40340:
I knew I could see the spirit in your eyes.

You can find these thugs hanging around and harassing people. 

Keep in mind talking with them is an exhausted option.  I wouldn't approach any of them without a blaster at my hip.
entries.s_d1008bcb: What is the problem? Have you done what I've asked?
entries.s_c7676f2f: Spice!  You said it was foods and medicine!
entries.s_c0a878d5: Indeed. Then fare thee well. No... make that fare thee poorly.
entries.s_b9bc27b2: Sure enough.  I thought it was going to be a challenge.
entries.s_a6cac2af: With questions like that you might as well join their ranks, I must have read you wrong.
entries.s_a082f8ab: Don't feel so bad... it's all to a good cause. My bank account! Ha!
entries.s_873db52a: Don't expect a welcoming party; like I said before, I wouldn't approach them without a blaster on your hip. When you get the disk, bring it back to me.
entries.s_6b8c7e69: You did. If there's nothing in this for me, I'm gone.
entries.s_6151c35f: Can I trust you with some information?
entries.s_53e9175a:
Would you have returned the disk had you known the contents were worth well over six million credits?  Didn't think so.  

Move along and learn from your mistakes.
entries.s_4f53003d: I should have expected as much. The stench of failure surrounds you... which I foolishly thought could be overcome. No chance.
entries.s_4e6ee0cd: The rich get richer. Too true. So that means I should become one of the rich.
entries.s_464748ae: I am willing to help, where do I start?
entries.s_41ec1c94: Sorry, it's a bad habit.  How can I help?
entries.s_2ae116f8: What is in it for me?
entries.s_257d7def:
You can find these thugs hanging around and being a nuisance.

Keep in mind talking with them is an exhausted option.  I wouldn't approach any of them without a blaster at my hip.
entries.s_209a7c7b: I just remembered that I don't care. Bye.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (padawan_peoples_soldier_01.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
